== SomeJauntyBackgrounds ==

Hello,
Here are some wallpapers that I made in my inspiration from those included in Intrepid.
Some might seem a little aggressive, but could appeal to the community.
Comments and criticisms are welcome.

=== Comments ===
* Beautiful!  I might take some of these for a spin with some elements from my Ubuntu Energy series.  I definitely like the fifth [EDIT: from third.  I can't count...] one, which is a bit more obvious.  Maybe some colour?  I know brown is our thing but I think that a well-placed splash of colour would really fit nicely. - -- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:legoaddict]]</nowiki> 
* Very nice backgrounds.  I am a fan of the darker contrasted background.  One of the better backgrounds for the Alpha set and I hope it is considered.  -- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:dashua]]</nowiki> 
* Thanks for your comments. I'll try to work on this before the deadline. I've done the same wallpapers in higher resolution and in 4:3 ratio.
You can download them here :
4:3 ratio : http://www.graphiksession.com/ubuntu/1600_1200.zip
